title: Federated chat server implemented in Tcl
author: ronsor
content: readme is pretty .you need tcl run and optionally tls tcl 1.6.7+ tls/ssl.edit chat.conf then run: tclsh chat.tclcurrently, use irc gateway simple chat client: connect localhost:6667 you the irc gateway enabled. : tclsh chatclient.tcl localhost 7654 <desired nickname> you to the simple quite awful chat client.protocol docs are protocol.md
